wikipedia_page.main: Sir George Osborne Morgan, 1st Baronet,  (8 May 1826 – 25 August 1897) was a Welsh lawyer and Liberal politician.

response: The equally imposing Henry Richard Memorial statue which dominates the Square at Tregaron was designed by Albert Toft and unveiled by Sir George Osborne Morgan on 18 August 1893.Tregaron: Images of a country town Tregaron and District Historical Society & Landmark Publishing UK, 2006. response: * Sir George Osborne Morgan, 1st Baronet  (1826–1897), lawyer and politician
*George Osborne Morgan introduces the Burials Bill and the Places of Worship (Acquisition of Land) Bill to Parliament.
** George Osborne Morgan is elected for the first time in Denbighshire.

response: During the late 19th century Brymbo Hall was the country home of the Liberal MP for Denbighshire, George Osborne Morgan: another Liberal MP, Christmas Price Williams, grew up there.Christmas Price Williams, Welsh Biography Online, National Library of Wales.
